extension.summary: Install my Addons
extension.description: Download and Install Addons from NVTTeam Repository

extension.summary: Digitally Imported Premium
extension.description:
Keep your groove going with no commercial interruptions and enjoy all of your favorite channels without hearing or seeing advertisements.
DI Premium audio quality is twice as good. Quality of the sound is (128k AAC, 320k MP3), hear the difference for yourself.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.summary: Unofficial Raspberry Pi configuration add-on for LibreElec
extension.description: This XBMC add-on for LibreElec allows Raspberry Pi settings such as overclocking to be configured without having to manually edit /flash/config.txt.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on has the potential to void the warranty of your Raspberry Pi. Use at your own risk!
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.summary: NVTTeam Music
extension.description: NVTTeam Music is a new way to listen and discover music thought KODI.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.summary: Poslušajte vse Slovenske radijske postaje.
extension.description: Omogoča poslušanje Slovenskih radijskih postaj, ki oddajajo preko interneta.

extension.summary: Show My IP
extension.description: Showing you network and system informations...

extension.summary: Auto Search for Subtitles on Play
extension.description: Auto Search for Subtitles on Playback start if no subs are found.

extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.summary: NVTTeam Popcorn Time: Immediately steam movies in KODI.
extension.description: With NVTTeam Popcorn Time you can search for movies that you can see immediately in KODI.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.description: Visualisations from Shadertoy

extension.summary: Plugin for YouTube
extension.description: YouTube is a one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
extension.summary: Dodatek za YouTube
extension.description: YouTube spada med največje video-sharing strani na svetu.
extension.summary: Plugin für YouTube
extension.description: YouTube ist ein eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
extension.summary: Wtyczka YouTube
extension.description: YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
extension.summary: Kiegészítő a YouTube-hoz
extension.description: A YouTube a világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
extension.summary: Plugin para YouTube
extension.description: YouTube es un uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
extension.summary: Видеодополнение YouTube
extension.description: Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
extension.summary: Plugin pour YouTube
extension.description: YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
extension.summary: YouTube附加元件
extension.description: 「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
extension.summary: Добавка за YouTube
extension.description: YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Exodus
extension.description: Please visit www.tvaddons.ag for Exodus support and assistance! Kindly note that Exodus is not an official part of the media player you are running, and therefore not to be mentioned within official support channels, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.summary: Zen Movies/TV Shows
extension.description: Watch Movies and TV Shows in High Definition and surround sound. Free providers might not work --- TO AUTHORIZE DEBRID LINKS USE THE URL RESOLVER Menu under TOOLS , AND ENABLE DEBRID SOURCES IN THE Providers SETTINGS ---
extension.disclaimer: The Author does not host or share any content, nor is affiliated with the content providers.

extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeonilta.
complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v5.9.4[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][I]v6.0.2[/I][CR]- Rework InfoPanel options[CR]- Some Widget fixes[CR]- Add BigNoids LibreElec settings screen[CR]- Add BigNoids sortletter jump to ShowCase, Landscape, Shift, Logo, MyFlix, Rightlist, and Panel views[CR][I]v6.0.1[/I][CR]- Removed now, next, and channel listings from the EPG window[CR]- New search button options (taken from Estuary)[CR][I]v6.0.0[/I][CR]- Rework Widget settings[CR]- Move some Main Menu customizer functions to the context menu (can use mapped key or longpress of select/enter to bring up the context menu)[CR]- Numerous PVR changes and fixes[CR]- New Customization section in skin settings[CR]- Arial font fixes[CR]- Add user selectable login screen background[CR]- Add user selectable InfoPopup delay[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikeNVT164/Aeon-Nox-NVT/commits/master
